# `FormIntroduction` Definition

Form introduction section with title, subtitle, image, and button text

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| title | `string` | Yes | Title of the introduction |
| imageUrl | `string` | No | URL of the image to display |
| subtitle | `string` | Yes | Subtitle of the introduction |
| buttonText | `string` | Yes | Text for the start button |
